array.param: object where rope starts and which fly behavior will be affected
specifies where on the object the rope should start, either a string (name of memory point) or an array of three numbers (vector in model coordinates).
object which is automatically attached to other side of rope (can be objNull, rope will stay with free end)
specifies where on the object the rope should finish, either a string (name of memory point) or an array of three numbers (vector in model coordinates)
define number of segments to be created (not used in A3)
object where rope starts and which fly behavior will be affected
specifies where on the object the rope should start, either a string (name of memory point) or an array of three numbers (vector in model coordinates)
define number of rope segments (not used in A3)
true if rope starts at one place and falls down unrolling itself, false to create it already in full length (default: false) (not used in A3)
